code: @Test public void testStringContent() throws Exception {     // include a UTF-8 char in the text \u0E08 is a Thai elephant     String body = "Hello Thai Elephant \u0E08".     template.sendBody("direct:in", body). }
protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:in").to("stream:out?encoding=UTF-8").         }     }. }
